name: The Stevie T Adventures
description:
Stevie T embarks on a journey to save a good friend of his. All he needs is his trustworthy Djetfighter, a manual and no pants whatsoever! Follow his adventures through 6+1 levels. Collect holocredits, buy upgrades, fight aliens, and defeat the bosses at the end of every level.

Controls (You can use keyboard or gamepad to navigate the menus and play the game):

Keyboard:

Arrow keys or WASD: move around

RCTRL or G: shoot

RSHIFT or T: use super weapon

ENTER or E: skip dialog when prompted

ESC for menu, P or PAUSE to pause the game.

Gamepad:

LStick or DPad: move around

A: shoot

Y: use super weapon

B: skip dialog when prompted

Start for menu, Back to pause the game.
